snippet: The explosion in Luxor came about a week after gunmen shot and killed two tourism police officers near the pyramids of Giza, raising fears that militants want to hurt the tourism sector.
abstract: Attack on Karnak Temple, tourist site in Luxor, Egypt, by suicide bomber and two gunmen week after skirmish near Giza pyramids displays brashness of Islamic militants determined to destroy Egyptian economy for sake of toppling Pres Abdel Fattah el-Sisi.
lead_paragraph: The explosion in Luxor came about a week after gunmen shot and killed two tourism police officers near the pyramids of Giza, raising fears that militants want to hurt the tourism sector.

headline.main: Militants Hit Karnak Temple, in 2nd Recent Attack on Egyptian Tourist Sites
headline.print_headline: Another Tourist Site, Karnak Temple, Is Struck in Egypt
